{"id":1044997306,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1694287248,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"35 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1044997306/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Recover Binary Search Tree","memory":"57.9 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    TreeNode *prevNode = NULL;\n    TreeNode *firstPoint = NULL;\n    TreeNode *endPoint = NULL;\n\n    void findSegment(TreeNode *root) {\n        if(root == NULL) {\n            return;\n        }\n\n        findSegment(root -> left);\n\n        if(prevNode) {\n            if(prevNode -> val > root -> val) {\n                if(firstPoint == NULL) {\n                    firstPoint = prevNode;\n                }\n                endPoint = root;\n            }\n        }\n\n        prevNode = root;\n        findSegment(root -> right);\n    }\n    void recoverTree(TreeNode* root) {\n        if(root == NULL) {\n            return;\n        }\n\n        findSegment(root);\n\n        int temp = firstPoint -> val;\n        firstPoint -> val = endPoint -> val;\n        endPoint -> val = temp;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
